body.p:
Hd Qrs 45th Ky Mtd Infy Vols
Lexington Ky 12th Apl, 1864
To his Excellency Govr Bramlette
Sir
I respectfully request that a commission may be ordered to issue to Joseph L. Rowland as 2nd Assistant Surgeon in my Regiment -- -- =45th Ky Infy April 12. 1864=1. 2. 3. 4
The circumstances in this case are somewhat Peculiar and sufficient I hope to induce your Excellency to depart from the rule requiring a certificate of Examination from the Medical Board --

Rowland is an enlisted -- man of Co "C" and has acted as Asst Surgeon since the organization of the Regiment, I can bear the fullest testimony to his zeal, efficiency and abilty, and know of no man in the service who has more fully earned promotion than he.

I have the honor to be
Very respectfully Your Obdt Svt
Jno: Mason Brown
Col 45th Ky Mtd Inf Vols

Issue Coms as requested
T E Bramlette

Hd qrs 45th Infy
45 Infy
Lexington Ky
April 12th 1864
Brown. Jno M
Col.
Recommends that a commission be issued to Jos L Rowland as 2 Lt Asst Surgeon of thr 45th Infty.

Issue commission as Requested
"T E Bramlette"
Issue Boyle
Com issued found
April 14. 1864
Recd A G. O. 13" Aprl 1864.
